dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, like, March 28th, right? Middle of the night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, like, March twenty eighth, right? Middle of the night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the night of March 28, an earthquake was recorded in a number of districts of the Zhambyl region and the city of Taraz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! In Kazakhstan, um, Zhambyl region, yeah? Just rocked.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! In Kazakhstan, um, Zhambyl region, yeah? Just rocked.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the earthquake that occurred in Kazakhstan on the night of March 28, several buildings in the Zhambyl region were damaged.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally rocked! And they’re saying several buildings, like, got damaged. Actual cracks in the House of Culture!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally rocked! And they're saying several buildings, like, got damaged. Actual cracks in the House of Culture!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the earthquake that occurred in Kazakhstan on the night of March 28, several buildings in the Zhambyl region were damaged. This was reported by the regional akimat (local government administration). According to preliminary information, cracks were found on the walls of the House of Culture in the village of Karakystak in the T. Ryskulova district...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The House of Culture, yeah! And, uh, the Merke district hospital too, which is, like, massive. Oh, and a school, I think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The House of Culture, yeah! And, uh, the Merke district hospital too, which is, like, massive. Oh, and a school, I think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary information, cracks were found on the walls of the House of Culture in the village of Karakystak in the T. Ryskulova district, the building of the Merke district hospital, and the school building in the village of Oytal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A school in Oytal! Yes, exactly! But listen, the best part?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A school in Oytal! Yes, exactly! But listen, the best part?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and the school building in the village of Oytal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No casualties, right? That’s what I saw!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No casualties, right? That's what I saw!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There are no reports of casualties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Zero reported! Thank goodness. And the regional akimat, you know, their local government, they're already on it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zero reported! Thank goodness. And the regional akimat, you know, their local government, they're already on it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was reported by the regional akimat (local government administration). ... There are no reports of casualties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! The operational HQ is up and running. And the governor, Erbol Karashukeev, he went straight to the ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! The operational H Q is up and running. And the governor, Erbol Karashukeev, he went straight to the ground.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the instructions of the regional akim (governor), the regional operational headquarters is working. ... The head of the region, Erbol Karashukeev, went to T. Ryskulova and Merke districts to get acquainted with the situation on the ground,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To Ryskulova and Merke districts, yeah, to just, like, see the situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To Ryskulova and Merke districts, yeah, to just, like, see the situation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The head of the region, Erbol Karashukeev, went to T. Ryskulova and Merke districts to get acquainted with the situation on the ground,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Immediately. And the intensity, um, in Merke village? Five points! That’s... quite a shake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Immediately. And the intensity, um, in Merke village? Five points! That's... quite a shake.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The highest intensity - 5 points - was recorded in the village of Merke, Merke district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five points! Yes, exactly! Pretty significant, uh, for that area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five points! Yes, exactly! Pretty significant, uh, for that area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The highest intensity - 5 points - was recorded in the village of Merke, Merke district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Kulan had four points, I mean, that's not nothing either, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Kulan had four points, I mean, that's not nothing either, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all! But then, Taraz, Shu, Korday, Moyynkum, they only felt, like, two points.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all! But then, Taraz, Shu, Korday, Moyynkum, they only felt, like, two points.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Still an earthquake though, you know? It spreads.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still an earthquake though, you know? It spreads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! But yeah, thankfully no loss of life, which is, um, the main thing, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! But yeah, thankfully no loss of life, which is, um, the main thing, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And they even have a hotline up for, like, questions, which is good.
